title: Executive Order 5806-Partial Restoration of Public Land for Airport, Alaska
content: Executive Order No. 3672, dated May 8, 1922, reserving certain therein-described land in Alaska for town-site purposes, is hereby revoked, in so far as it applies to tract 32, containing 140.24 acres, shown on a supplemental plat of survey, Fourth Addition, Anchorage Town Site, township 13 north, range 3 west, Seward meridian, Alaska, accepted May 29, 1931.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5806-Partial Restoration of Public Land for Airport, Alaska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361407
